casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2005-0180. Spivey v. Keller.

Hardin App. No. 6-04-09, 2004-Ohio-6667. Discretionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decision in 2004-1492 and 2004-1647, Estate of Harrold, v. Collier, Wayne App. No. 03CA0064, 2004-Ohio-4331; and briefing schedule stayed.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
